code: import{serverActions}from'../../actions';import initialState from'../../initialState';var server=function server(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState.server;var actions=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(actions.type){case serverActions.SERVER_REQUEST:return{successMessage:{},errorMessage:{}};case serverActions.SERVER_ERROR:return{successMessage:{},errorMessage:actions.error.data};case serverActions.SERVER_SUCCESS:return{successMessage:actions.data,errorMessage:{}};default:return state;}};export default server;
